nodes.text: The Namadii Corridor was a trade route, on which Coruscant, the capital world of the Galactic Republic, was located. At Coruscant—within the Core Worlds' Corusca sector—the Namadii Corridor intersected with both the Corellian Trade Spine and the Perlemian Trade Route. It shared its name with the Mid Rim astronomical object Namadii.
